DOC.brief_title: The Effects Patient Features Opioid Induced End-Tidal CO2
DOC.detailed_description: Emergency department patient receive opioid pain medicine morphine , fentanyl , Dilaudid eligible . After receive pain medication , small soft plastic tube place upper lip nose . This tube use measure amount carbon dioxide patient breathing . It also use deliver oxygen provider feel patient need . The carbon dioxide breathe measure collect . Other information collect height , weight , vital sign . Patient participation time approximately 2 hour emergency department visit .
DOC.criteria: non intubated patient receive intravenous opioid medication mechanically ventilate patient patient physiologic shock
